content: Michael Fisher - Research Explorer The University of Manchester Michael Fisher Royal Academy of Engineering Chair in Emerging Technologies, Prof Professor of Computer Science, Autonomy and Verification https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0875-3862 Personal profile OverviewFor up to date information, see here Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all.
